item.description: ðŸš¨ I haven’t further looked into this. But according to comments under the Gist linked below, this unfortunately no longer works as pointed out. I’m currently very interested in serverless (aka no dedicated backend required) JavaScript Web Applications … with AWS S3, Lambda & API Gateway you can actually get pretty far. Yet there is one thing I didn’t know how to do: Pub/Sub or “Realtime Messaging”. Realtime messaging allows to build web applications that can instantly receive messages published by another application (or the same one running in a different person’s browser).
